lyrics.text:
Na’e pekia ‘a Sīsū
Koe’uhi ko au,
Ke u hao pea u mo’ui,
Ki hoku ‘Otua.

Koe’uhi ke u lava’i
‘I he’eku tui,
‘O hoko ki hoku ‘Eiki,
‘I he laumālie.

Fakamo’ui, ‘oku ou
Fakafeta’i atu,
‘I ho ‘ofa tu’uga’a pē
Ta’e fa’alaua.

Pea u fa’a tali ‘aki
‘A e nima tui,
Ke u ma’u ia, ‘o ongo’i
Ho’o ‘ofa lahi.

Pea ‘oku fai feinga
Hoku laumālie,
Ki he ‘ofa mo’oni,
Fakalaumālie.

’Oku fonu hoku loto
‘I he afi vela,
Ke liliu mo’oni ia,
Ko e fu’u ‘ofa.
